# Image Reference Guide for CurtLab Website

This document lists all the images used in the CurtLab website. Replace these placeholder filenames with actual images.

- **hero-bg-1.jpg** (1440 x 1440px) - Main hero background image showcasing elegant curtains or window treatments

## Image Recommendations

### For Hero/Background Images
- Use high-quality images (at least 1920px wide)
- Showcase elegant curtain/blind installations
- Prefer images with soft, natural lighting
- Ensure images work well with overlay effects

### For Product Images
- Use consistent aspect ratios
- Show products in realistic room settings
- Include close-up detail shots when possible
- Maintain consistent lighting across all products

### For Team Images
- Professional headshots or casual workplace photos
- Consistent background style
- High resolution for crisp display
- Friendly, approachable expressions

## Image Formats
- Prefer .jpg for photographs
- Use .png for images with transparency
- Optimize all images for web (compress to reduce file size)
- Consider using WebP format for better compression

## Accessibility
- Ensure sufficient contrast for overlaid text
- Provide meaningful alt text descriptions
- Consider color blindness when choosing images
- Test images on various screen sizes
